text: Juan Antonio Fernández Segui (born July 18, 1947) is a Spanish Fitness coach and manager. He was the manager of C.D. FAS and Burgos CF. ==External links== * Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:Spanish football managers Category:Expatriate football managers in El Salvador Category:C.D. FAS managers
title: Juan Fernández Segui
